puffer.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a small piece of equipment containing medicine which you breathe in through your mouth, to help you breathe more easily
puffer.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Asthma can be made worse by using puffers too often.
puffer.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a type of tropical fish that can fill itself with air so that it looks almost round
